SELECT review_no_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO review( review_no, writer, review_txt, review_star, review_file, product_no, reg_date ) VALUES( #{review_no}, #{writer}, #{review_txt}, #{review_star}, #{review_file}, #{product_no}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT writer, review_txt, review_file, reg_date, review_star product_no FROM review WHERE product_no = #{product_no} ORDER BY reg_date DESC

SELECT r.review_txt, r.review_file, r.review_star, r.reg_date, r.product_no, p.product_image, p.product_name, p.product_color FROM review r INNER JOIN s_product p ON writer = #{writer} AND p.product_no = r.product_no ORDER BY reg_date DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE writer = #{writer} AND product_no = #{product_no}
